statuses.description: Line has been edited by others. Please edit if incorrect!

statuses.name: reviewing
statuses.description: Line is being reviewed and is no longer editable. Click 'Verify' to review.

statuses.name: completed
statuses.description: Line has been completed and is no longer editable

statuses.name: flagged
statuses.description: Line has been marked as incorrect or problematic
